single_agent_questions.question: Send an email to john@example.com with subject 'Project Update' and body 'The project is on track'
Read all unread emails from my inbox
Search for emails containing the word 'meeting'
Delete the email with ID email_1
Show me the email with ID email_2
Send a thank you email to sarah@example.com for her help on the presentation
Create a meeting event for tomorrow at 2 PM titled 'Team Standup'
Show me the details of event_1
List all my events for this week
Update event_1 to start at 3 PM instead of 2 PM
Delete the event event_2 from my calendar
Schedule a one-on-one with my manager for Friday at 10 AM
Create a new bug issue with title 'Login page not responsive on mobile'
Show me the details of issue PROJ-1
Search for all issues with status 'In Progress'
Update issue PROJ-1 status to 'Done'
Delete issue PROJ-2 from the project
Create a task for implementing user authentication with high priority
Calculate 156 + 289 + 432
What is 1000 minus 237?
Multiply 25 by 48
Divide 3456 by 12
Calculate 2 to the power of 10
What is 567 times 89?
Add up these numbers: 45, 67, 89, 123

multi_agent_questions.question: Send an email to team@example.com about tomorrow's meeting at 2 PM and create the calendar event
Create a bug report for the login issue and send an email to the dev team about it
Check my calendar for next week and send a summary email to my manager
Calculate the total of 1500, 2300, and 890, then email the result to finance@example.com
Create a sprint planning meeting for Friday and create corresponding Jira tasks for the meeting agenda
Search for emails about bugs and create Jira issues for any untracked problems
Update the project deadline in Jira to next Monday and schedule a review meeting
Calculate the total story points (13, 8, 21, 5) and update the sprint issue with the total
Schedule a bug triage meeting, create a Jira issue for tracking, and send invites to the team
Calculate monthly expenses (rent: 2000, utilities: 300, food: 800) and email the breakdown
Get the status of PROJ-1 and email an update to stakeholders@example.com
List all meetings this week and calculate the total hours spent in meetings
Find all high priority Jira issues and send a summary email to the project manager
Reschedule event_1 to next Tuesday and notify all attendees via email
Calculate how many days until 2025-12-31 and create a countdown event
Find all open issues, count them, and multiply by average 2 hours per issue to estimate workload
Count my meetings this week, calculate total hours, and email the summary to my manager
Create a release planning issue, schedule the planning meeting, and send invites to the team
Calculate the completion rate: 15 done out of 23 total issues, then update the project summary
Search emails for feature requests and create corresponding Jira stories
Cancel event_2 and send cancellation emails to all attendees
Mark PROJ-1 as completed and notify the team via email
Calculate the project budget split (40% dev, 30% design, 30% testing) from $10000 and email breakdown
Schedule daily standups for next week and create a Jira epic to track the sprint
Read emails about invoices, sum up the amounts, and reply with the total

rpa_included_questions.question: Search for the latest technology news and send a summary email to team@example.com
Search for AI news, write a report about it, and schedule a meeting to discuss the findings
Write a weekly progress report and create a Jira task for reviewing it
Collect attendance for the team meeting and email the summary to the organizer
Search for the latest news about artificial intelligence
Generate a project status report with sections for progress, blockers, and next steps
Record attendance for 'Q4 Planning Meeting' - mark john@example.com as attending
Search tech news, write a briefing report, schedule a discussion, and send invites
Search for industry news and create Jira tasks for any relevant action items
Get attendance count for 'Team Meeting', calculate attendance rate from 20 invites, and email results
Write a monthly summary report and email it to stakeholders@example.com
Search for product launch news, create a competitive analysis issue, and schedule review meeting
Collect attendance summary, create a Jira task for follow-ups with absent members, and email the list
Search for latest cybersecurity news and send urgent alerts to security@example.com
Write a sprint retrospective report and schedule the next sprint planning
Collect and show attendance summary for 'All Hands Meeting'
Write a technical documentation report and create a Jira task for peer review
Search for competitor news, create tracking issues, and email analysis to product@example.com
Get attendance for 'Training Session', calculate percentage from 50 expected, and generate report
Search for industry conference news, schedule team discussion, and send details to team
Generate a customer feedback summary report and email it to support@example.com
Write incident post-mortem report, create follow-up Jira tasks, and schedule review meeting
Search for news about machine learning and deep learning
Record attendance for sarah@example.com as 'maybe' for Leadership Summit and email confirmation
Search for DevOps news and create Jira improvement suggestions based on findings
Write quarterly business review report, schedule presentation meeting, and send invites to executives
Get attendance summary, calculate no-show rate, and create a Jira task to address the issue
Search for upcoming tech conferences, write summary report, and email to learning@example.com
Write a security audit report and create high-priority Jira issues for vulnerabilities
Generate a markdown report about project milestones with timeline and deliverables sections
Search for open source trends, write analysis report, create research tasks, and email to innovation@example.com
Collect attendance for 'Product Demo' and schedule a follow-up for those who couldn't attend
Search for market growth news, calculate ROI projections, and email investment report to finance team
Write risk assessment report, create mitigation Jira issues, and schedule risk review meeting
Search for cloud computing news and send a technology update to engineering@example.com
Get attendance for Strategy Planning, create makeup session for absent members, and send invites
Write performance optimization report and create Jira tasks for each improvement area
Collect workshop attendance, calculate cost per attendee from $5000 budget, and email metrics to hr@example.com
Search for agile methodology news, write best practices report, schedule training, create tracking issue, and email invites
Generate compliance audit report, create remediation Jira tasks, and email findings to compliance@example.com
Search for blockchain technology news and email key insights to research@example.com
Write training needs assessment, create training Jira tasks, and schedule kick-off meeting
Collect attendance for 'Sales Kickoff', calculate attendance percentage from 100 invites, write summary
Search for data privacy regulation news, schedule compliance review, and email updates to legal@example.com
Write API integration report and create Jira epics for each integration phase
Generate user onboarding guide and email it to new hires mailing list
Search for revenue growth statistics, calculate projected annual growth, and email forecast to cfo@example.com
Write UX research findings, create design improvement Jira tasks, and schedule design review
Collect attendance for 'Engineering All-Hands', schedule 1-on-1s with absent team members
Search for database optimization techniques, create implementation Jira tasks, email summary to backend@example.com
